name: Kélian
meta_description: Passionate, curious, autonomous, and self-taught software developer proficient in several languages. Explore my projects to get to know me better.
description: A passionate software developer since the age of 12, I have progressively acquired skills in various fields. Curious, autonomous, and self-taught, I master several languages and easily adapt to any type of environment. I continue to actively train in cybersecurity to constantly deepen and update my knowledge.

realprice.title: RealPrice
realprice.description: RealPrice is a practical currency conversion app for travelers. Easily compare exchange rates, adjust bank fees, and calculate your costs accurately. Stay informed with automatic internet updates for precise conversions wherever you are.

i20.title: I20 Interface
i20.description: Custom car radio interface for my car, a Hyundai i20 gen2.

bkcrackgui.title: Cracker Inspector
bkcrackgui.description: Graphical user interface for cracking legacy zip encryption using the Biham and Kocher known-plaintext attack.

items.name: ERP Module Development - Geodis Integration
items.description: Design and development of an ERP module enabling automated creation of Geodis shipments. Implementation of a shipment creation script via Geodis APIs, then modification of SQL procedures to integrate the script call directly from the ERP.

items.name: Data Flow Developer Analyst
items.description:
- Modification and maintenance of data flows (CSV, JSON, SQL)

- Initial development of an [b]API connection module[/b]

- Conducted [b]security testing on HR management software[/b]

items.name: Web-ERP Malfunction Resolution
items.description: Analysis and resolution of a blocking incident in the communication module between the website and the ERP. Identification of an SSL certificate verification error in a PHP module and restoration of system services.

items.name: Bachelor's in Software Development
items.description:
- Evolution of an application portal (Java Spring Boot for backend and Angular for frontend)

- Migration of PostgreSQL database to a new PostgreSQL 16 server (creation of a Python interface to facilitate the migration)

- Migration of projects to a new Kubernetes server

items.name: 2nd Year BTS SIO
items.description:
- Creation of [b]GitLab-CI configuration[/b] files for project migration

- Creation of APIs via [b]Gravitee[/b]

- Creation of a [b]Python script[/b] to transfer dependencies

- Creation of [b]RabbitMQ alert queries on Prometheus[/b]

- Creation of [b]RabbitMQ alert dashboards on Grafana[/b]

items.name: 1st Year BTS SIO
items.description:
- Modification of web applications (for production) using [b]Angular[/b]

- Creation of test matrices on [b]Squash[/b]

- Creation of interfaces for a supply management project using [b]Angular[/b]

- Conducted an [b]IT security test[/b]
